name: top_backlinks
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool best_backlink_checker_api.
Tool description: Best Backlink checker, You can check Top backlinks, New backlinks, Poor Backlinks, etc
API description: Fetches the list of top backlinks for a given domain using the Best Backlink Checker API.

domain.description: The domain for which to retrieve the top backlinks.
